verbs.description: The United States [V: is] assuring North Korean leader Kim Jong Un that his ouster is not part of the agenda for the summit next month between Kim and Trump .
[ARG0: The United States] is [V: assuring] [ARG2: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARG1: that his ouster is not part of the agenda for the summit next month between Kim and Trump] .
The United States is assuring North Korean leader Kim Jong Un that [ARG1: his ouster] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: part of the agenda for the summit next month between Kim and Trump] .
